thread.section_title: Speke Resort and Conference Centre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: SHEER DELIGHTS!
thread.title_full: SHEER DELIGHTS! - Review of Speke Resort and Conference Centre, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Omoniyi_David
title: SHEER DELIGHTS!
text:
Okay, we did NOT get to stay at Speke Resort nor at the Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort, but we visited both on a site inspection as part of activities for the Pearl of Africa Tourism Expo POATE 2017. Speke Resort is splendid! Absolutely love the place. We went around and the ambience is truly special. I work with Afro Tourism and we are on the lookout for great lodges and accommodation facilities across the continent which we can recommend to our clients or take them to. As far as Kampala is concerned, this is one of the top 3 resorts.
See all photos
